abstract: The Day: In the age of Occupy Wall Street, would-be mayors apparently sense that evidence of street activism on the resume may be a boon. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: In the age of Occupy Wall Street, would-be mayors apparently sense that evidence of street activism on the resume may be a boon. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.

headline.main: You're Under Arrest. It Will Help When You Run for Mayor.
